articles.title: Actor Michael Keaton honored as Man of the Year by Harvard’s Hasty Pudding theater group
articles.description:
Hasty Pudding Theatricals gives out its Man and Woman of the Year awards to people who have made lasting and impressive contributions to the world of entertainment.

The post Actor Michael Keaton honored as Man of the Year by Harvard’s Hasty Pudding theater group appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Michael Keaton received the Man of the Year award from Hasty Pudding Theatricals on February 8, 2026.
The award recognizes significant contributions to entertainment, celebrating Keaton's impactful career.
Boston residents benefit from cultural events like this, enhancing the city's artistic reputation.

articles.title: Eight things Patriots must do to win Super Bowl LX
articles.description:
The Patriots need an MVP-level performance from Drake Maye to solve a stout Seattle defense.

The post Eight things Patriots must do to win Super Bowl LX appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots need MVP-level performance from rookie quarterback Drake Maye to defeat Seattle.
Strong Seattle defense presents significant challenge for the Patriots in Super Bowl LX.
Boston fans expect a thrilling matchup as the Patriots aim for their next championship.
